name: Famousity Card Game
description: Unique online multiplayer card game where famous people from history meet each other and form legendary teams.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities. DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 1024 MB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1000 MB available space
